text.text_translated:
Society, not nature, says girls should like arts.  
Society also says girls should leave maths and physics to boys.  
Because of this, girls see few female scientists as role models.  
Cartoons often show a crazy scientist and a smart inventor as men.  
They also show an adventurous astronaut as a man.  
Some people think scientists are not cool.  
They think scientists are not good with people.  
Some think their work is alone and far from the world.  
The media shows false stereotypes.  
These ideas can make girls feel they are not scientists.  
Girls may see science as a job not good for them.  
If girls see more good female scientists, they feel sure about science.  
They also feel they belong in those subjects.
